Translations.Text: vecavezna bibeni israile-lbahra feetev `ala kavmiy ya`kufune `ala asnamil lehum. kalu ya muse-c`al lena ilahen kema lehum aliheh. kale innekum kavmun techelun
inne haulai mutebberum ma hum fihi vebatilum ma kanu ya`melun
kale egayra-llahi ebgikum ilahev vehuve feddalekum `ale-l`alemin
veiz enceynakum min ali fir`avne yesumunekum sue-l`azab. yukattilune ebnaekum veyestahyune nisaekum. vefi zalikum belaum mir rabbikum `azim
veva`adna musa selasine leyletev veetmemnaha bi`asrin fetemme mikatu rabbihi erbe`ine leyleh. vekale musa liehihi harune-hlufni fi kavmi veaslih vela tettebi` sebile-lmufsidin

velemma cae musa limikatina vekellemehu rabbuhu kale rabbi erini enzur ileyk. kale len terani velakini-nzur ile-lcebeli feini-stekarra mekanehu fesevfe terani. felemma tecella rabbuhu lilcebeli ce`alehu dekkev veharra musa sa`ika. felemma efaka kale subhaneke tubtu ileyke veena evvelu-lmu'minin
